episode.title: A Couple of Awkward Swipes
episode.rawTitle: 250: ‘A Couple of Awkward Swipes’ With MG Siegler
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Very special guest MG Siegler returns to the show. Topics include Apple’s original content strategy and a general look at the state of the company.
episode.showNotes:
Very special guest MG Siegler returns to the show. Topics include Apple’s original content strategy and a general look at the state of the company.
